text.section: All money paid out by the Fund under this subtitle may be recovered by the Fund from the uninsured party at fault in any manner provided by law, including the Maryland Tax Refund Intercept Program.

A judgment that is assigned to or obtained by the Fund:
is considered in its entirety as taken for the use of the State; and
shall be indexed in the appropriate court records in the name of the State of Maryland, Maryland Automobile Insurance Fund.

If the Fund brings suit to enforce a judgment obtained under this subtitle against an uninsured party at fault, the Fund may recover the actual costs of collection, including reasonable attorney's fees.
